transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir good afternoon.
Executive: Ye city software India Private Limited Darshak ji se baat kar rahe hai meri.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Darshak ji mai Atif ji ka manager baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se actually mere pass me not satisfied feedback aaya tha regarding the interaction jo Atif ji se aapka hua tha right?
Customer: Ek minute madam ko bataye usko.
Executive: IndiaMART na se complaint kar de.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Mam good afternoon kaise ho aap?
Customer: Yes good afternoon badhiya aap kaise ho boliye.
Executive: Badhiya mam thank you for sorry aap logo ko disturb kiya actually kal na Atif ji ka interaction hua tha yaha par aapse hua tha ya sir se baat kiya tha.
Customer: Ha mere se hi hua tha.
Executive: To uska ek feedback mere pass aaya tha WhatsApp pe jo ki not satisfied shayad aap logo ne diya tha so janna chahte the ki koi issue hum face kar rahe hai ya matlab Atif ji ke liye.
Customer: Ha issue face hum aaj se nahi kar rahe actually bahut dino se kar rahe hai aaj ka nahi hai wo I think mai sach bolu na to dekho abhi ye gyarwa mahina chal raha hai na samajhiye ki mai panch panch se che mahine se ye sari cheeze mai bahut baar bol chuki hu aapke waha pe koi Riya madam aaye fir ye Asif sir hai pata nahi do teen log aur bhi change hue hai bahut baar maine complaint kiya hai first meri jo complaints hai wo mai aapko batati hu theek hai first ki jo calls aate the hame jab humne renewal karwaya na uske baad se aap agar aapke pass wo chart hota hai unhone mujhe bataya tha ki bhi is tarah se aapko dikhta hai to waha pe aap dekhoge to calls ka jo flow tha theek hai wo down down aur sirf down hi ja raha hai aur is mahine ki 7 tarikh hui hai I don't know phone aaya hoga sir ko to nahi pata lekin mujhe jaha tak pata hai mujhe samne se koi bhi call nahi aaya hai jo leads aati thi uska.
Customer: Ha first meri ye problem hai second jo hamari tally ka aur jo basic jo main jo humne rakha tha na ki mujhe tally ka inquiry chahiye ya etcetera wo nahi mil raha hai mujhe aur wo aaj se nahi bahut dino se ye chal raha hai aisa hai.
Executive: Abhi aapka ye number WhatsApp pe hai koi number WhatsApp pe hai sir aapka?
Customer: Ye hai dusra number de du mai apna?
Executive: Aap koi sa bhi number mujhe WhatsApp pe de dijiye.
Customer: 7575 ha 8050 ha 21 21 theek hai aap apna WhatsApp open kariye dekhiye maine hello mam karke ek message bheja hai aapke WhatsApp pe.
Executive: Ji open hi hai ha mila mujhe.
Customer: Yes so mai aapko yaha ka jo algorithm hai theek hai na wo mai aapko bata deta hu aap thoda sa samajh jayenge kyuki aap software me deal kar rahe hai to aapke liye easy hoga right?
Customer: Ek do cheeze puch sakti hu aap agar mujhe ha ha definitely definitely aapke waha se jab bhi koi query hum raise karte hai na to aapke waha se kya bolte hai ki bhai first ye bolte hai ki bhai jiske sath bhi aap deal kar rahe ho unke pass se aap feedback lo feedback me stars lo theek hai chalo wo mai agree karti hu ki bhai chalo wo lena chahiye dusri cheez aisa bolte hai ki bhai lead purchase me kya hota hai ki jab client Google search karta hai aur waha pe jab tally likhta hai kuch bhi likhta hai to waha pe un logo ka naam pehle dikhta hai jisko stars jyada ho aisa bolte hai abhi jab humne first liya tha na tab to aisa kuch nahi tha abhi Google humne chalo uska review liya feedback liya na liya wo second point hai na lekin lead to aana chahiye na jab humne starting kiya tha IndiaMART pe tab aisa kuch nahi tha.
Executive: Wo algorithm bhi clear kar de raha hu ye sabse pehle hum start karte hai buylead consumption se aapko lagega aapka jitna bhi response depend karega IndiaMART pe wo depend karta hai buylead ke consumption pe theek hai to agar mai pichle December se baat kar raha hu 2024 se aap 24 days aapka software operate hota tha matlab hamare theek hai uske baad 88 buylead consume karte the theek hai aur agar mai last month ko le leta hu to che din me sirf 9 buylead consume hue right isme mai sare issues cover kar raha hu ki buylead nahi aaya hoga related nahi hoga ya mujhe apne product se related buylead consume ho ja raha hoga koi aur le le raha hoga right is tarah se ye issue aa raha hoga theek hai dusri cheez kya hai jo buylead consumption hamara vary karta hai right jaise ye buylead consumption vary kar raha hai iski wajah se jo hamara inquiry ka flow hai right wo bahut jyada vary kiya hai mai aapko wo bhi screenshot bhej raha hu ye aapka inquiry ka screenshot hai jo maine aapko wala bheja tha ye aapka inquiry screenshot hai to ye during the over the time isme ek saal me number of suppliers increase hue right lekin hamara jo buylead consumption jo pichli baar 88 tha pichle saal right uske against me hume 122 inquiries mile mile the na and to all agar aap dekhenge uske agle mahine 64 buylead consumption aapne kiya to aapka jo inquiry flow tha 95 ho gaya right uske baad wo aur kam hua 40 buylead consumption hua to inquiry flow 64 ho gaya right aur jaise hi aapne March me buylead ka flow increase kiya 67 kiya automatically inquiry badh gaya right to ye aap dekhenge fully proportional hai isi tarah se jo maine October ka example liya wo isliye liya October me humne sabse kam 9 buylead consume kiya right aur inquiry dekhiye sabse kam kis me aayegi hamare pass?
Customer: October 25 ki baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Ha October 25 ki baat kar rahe hai dono me buylead kam hua isliye inquiry kam hua right to ye dhyan rakhiyega aap aapne hamare pass jo package liya hua hai jitna aap registered hai hume ek cheez dhyan rakhni hai TrustSeal package hai 34 buylead hume aapko me milti hai right matlab mai che din bhi working lagata hu to TrustSeal 36 ho gaya right aap usme lead ka sir dekho ek ek ek chart aapne jo bheja usme dekhoge na June 25 ka aap dekhoge to 82 hai right abhi uske baad July me 36 hi hua hai theek hai na abhi us time pe samjho ki chalo humne shayad lead nahi li hogi uski wajah se kam ho gaya hoga right lekin fir agar 32 36 bada fir kam ho gaya lekin aisa kyu hua kyuki samne utni consume ho hi nahi mujhe aa hi nahi rahi hai to mai kaha se lungi aisa hai.
Executive: Wo mai bata raha hu uska uska tarika bhi mai aapko bata raha hu jab aapko aisa lagta hai ki mere pass buylead show nahi kar rahi hai right maine aapko ek link diya hai trade.indiamart.com ye employee portal hai normally hum dete nahi hai customer ko iska to isme ye hai incognito mode pe aap open kiya kijiye aapko jis product se related buylead dekhni hai incognito mode pe kijiye aur login mat kijiyega bola number se aap dekh jab kar lijiye aap easy rahega.
Customer: Ha maine open kiya abhi.
Executive: Abhi waha pe login karne ke liye bolega to bas login mat karna refresh kar dena page ko jab bhi.
Customer: Theek hai page open hai theek hai ab aapko waha pe search karne ka option aa raha hoga buylead ke upar jo bhi product ka buylead lena hai upar ki side aa raha hoga ha ha ha aap apna product name daliye like ki tally hai theek hai to tally dala ha jo bhi aapko jis bhi naam se aapko lagta hai ki aapka buyer search kar raha hoga tally dala maine sirf fir enter kiya ha to ab jaise hi aap enter karenge currently IndiaMART ke mere pass jitne bhi buylead available honge pan India se right with location filter sab aapko waha dikh jayenge ye number se login karne bolega refresh kar dijiyega login mat kijiyega otherwise aap nahi login nahi kar rahe nahi nahi nahi login nahi kar rahe hu mai to ye ye ek tarika hota hai mam jab bhi koi customer humse for example aapko chhodo koi bhi customer jo aaj ke tarikh me mujhe leather shoes ki requirement bata de kitni hai IndiaMART ke pass right to mai isi process se bata paunga ki itni buylead hai okay matlab ye wo wale numbers hai matlab yaha pe like ki kuch client tally search tally search to achcha okay okay un logo ko jo un logo ko jo requirement hai wo aapne yaha pe dala ki bhi in logo ko requirement hai aisa hai ye ek tarah se pool hai ye ek tarah se pool hai agar mere pass agar ye lead aati bhi nahi hai to bhi mai yaha se le paungi aisa hai ab mai aapko ha ye mai kyu bata raha hu aapka jo seller panel hai mai login bhi kyu mana kar raha hu jo seller panel hai aapko jo inquiry aati hai wo aapke purchase pattern pe aati hai right abhi isliye all over India ka jo purchase pattern hai isme jo panch mahine ka purchase pattern hai aapka usme buylead kam consume ho rahi hai right to jo pattern se bahar hai wo aapko show dikhayega IIG right to yaha par to sab kuch dikhega to yaha par jo buylead aapko kaam ki dikh rahi hai aapko kuch nahi karna us buylead ka title copy kijiyega ya to aap apne seller panel pe khol lijiyega ya fir yaha pe contact buyer pe jab aap click karenge to wo aapse aapka number mangega tab number se login kijiyega right lekin ye process aapko fir baar baar karna padega che baar din me ya trade pe jaake refresh karke check kar le dobara dobara okay mujhe ye link open karna hai mujhe jiska bhi require hai to direct tally hai to tally dal ke fir yaha pe mujhe sirf enter karungi to ye sara jisko bhi requirement hai wo aa jayega to ye kya hai number mujhe number mujhe kabhi dalna hai number jab aap buylead select kar lo aapko koi buylead kaam ki dikh rahi hai for example ye kaam ki hai like ke tally agar leni hai to mai connect to buyer me jaungi to mujhe number dikhega ya mujhe mera number dalna padega pehle wo wala number dalna padega jo registered hai jisse aapka package chal raha hai okay wo dalne ke baad mujhe lead milegi right lead automatically consume ho jayegi fir kuch nahi karna lead manager me jayega lead manager se waha se aap usse connect kar sakte hai theek hai chalo okay ye mai aapko personally isliye bata raha hu mam IndiaMART me kuch bhi badal jaye isme na yaha pe boliye boliye aap boliye theek hai aur ye lekin iska mujhe thoda bataiye na ye kyu itna low ho raha hai mujhe ye na ye nahi samajh me aa raha hai ye low hone ka reason sirf ek hi hai mam kyuki hamari jo consumption hai wo decrease ho rahi hai is wajah se ka flow decrease ho raha hai wo kaha se mai lungi mere pass se leads aayegi to mai usko consume karungi portal bataya na aap yaha se karo aapke pass usme bhi agar mere city ki nahi aati hai aur mai kisi aur cities ki aur waha pe karke karo uska bhi koi matlab nahi hai nahi aap apne hi city ka purchase kijiye aap apne alag alag products dal ke check kijiye near by ka check kijiye mai itna sure hu mam agar che nahi bhi kar paye kisi bhi point pe right teen to mil jayegi matlab mujhe ye process che bar karni hogi right to ye thoda continue rahega thoda sa ye rahega aur ek cheez aur isme pata hai kya for example aapne char buylead consume kari mai kehta hu daily ki right mai kehta hu aapki che nahi ya mai kehta hu teen hi consume hui to che 18 21 buylead consume hogi 21 into four kar lijiye kitna hota hai 84 hota hai tab bhi aap 84 buylead consume kar jaoge jo aap ever highest kar doge samajh rahe hai aap mam to mera kehna ye hai ki aapki us buylead consumption ko mai agar us level pe le jau jis level pe aap kiya karte the 2014 se right to inquiry ka flow automatically drastically increase hoga aapka ha lekin inquiry nahi aati hai wahi pe atke hue hai aap aap jo bol rahe hai wo mai samajh gayi lekin ab kaisa ho gaya hai sir sach bolu na to abhi portal kaisa ho gaya pata hai inquiry hi nahi de raha hai inquiry dega to mai kuch lungi ye experiment aap ye experiment aap karke dekho mera WhatsApp number bhi aapke pass aa hi gaya hoga right aur aap mere se sync me rehna aap do hafte at least 15 days try karo next 15 days aap dekho ye jo aapne bola wo wala ha 16 din aap khud dekhoge aapke process me na kuch na kuch achchi requirements aapko click karegi karegi mam kyuki hum itne time se kaam kar rahe hai right aapko mai abhi significantly maps ke sath dikha raha hu jaha pe aapki buylead consumption jyada hai waha par aapka inquiry ka flow jyada hai right to mere ko inquiry badhane ka ek simple sa tarika pata hai mai buylead consume karau right to usse marketing hogi uske basis pe aapko inquiry generate hongi aur agar aapko do hi customer bhi achcha mil gaya mam to main shikayat to ye hai ki business milna chahiye ye sab hum kyu kar rahe hai business ke liye kar rahe hai right ek aadha business bhi achcha mil jayega right aapka bhi confidence jab hum jude the na wahi wahi jab jude the tab itna achcha chal raha tha aur abhi aisa ho raha hai na to kya abhi mind me baith nahi raha hai pata hai mam kya hai internet penetration jo hai na mam abhi day by day badh raha hai aap yakin nahi karenge jis industry me aap listed hai na jis product pe aap listed hai ya jis business ko aap kar rahe hai right aapke shahar me aap nahi jante honge kitne log us business ko kar rahe hai sahi baat hai aapki wo baat se wo competition is wajah se badhta ja raha hai pehle kya tha bechne wale do the kharidne wale 10 the to panch panch gir jate the ab bechne wale 15 kharidne wale saat hai ha to yaha ki leads mujhe itni hoti hai ye sab itni out of ki aati hai na sir ye mobile number mang raha hai maine dusri baar wo link open kiya na aur sirf select ki cheez bhi kiya aur skip ka option nahi aa raha hai ha to mobile number mang raha hoga na aap isko window ko close karke ek bar se window open kar lijiye aur uska screenshot le lijiye jo buylead dikh rahi hai na uska title copy kar lijiye chalo theek hai try karte hai ye cheez try karke dekhiye mam lekin mujhe pata hai thoda difficult hoga but ek bar thodi cheeze sahi ho jayengi streamline ho jayengi to automatically response sahi ho jayega right aur sochiye ki at any point of time na kabhi bhi na buylead ko consume karna mat chhodiye matlab mai kehta hu agar aap leave kar diye right koi na koi staff to rehta hi hoga usko sikha do ki at least buylead consume karke jaye mai aapko batata hu ek bar buylead post hui aapne customer ko phone kiya usne bola are maine dali hi nahi right koi problem nahi hai aapne jis city ki jis product ki buylead consume ki to mere pass purchase pattern aa gaya na ki is product se related is area ki buylead kaun consume kar raha hai ye company consume kar rahi hai right ab software ko agar mai aisi milti julti koi inquiry agar aati hai aur aapke pass chali jati hai to wo kisko benefit milega aapko milega aur wo customer aap convert karwa loge right to wo cheez hai theek hai next time aapse hi judu na bilkul aap number save kar lijiyega chalo aap ek request tha mera feedback aayega aapke pass wo feedback please aap mere share kar dijiyega chalo is bar 7 tarikh hui hai 10 din try karte hai fir dekhte hai kya hota hai aur calls ka kya rahega wo calls ka maine bola wo dekha aapne calls bhi improve hone shuru ho jayengi jab inquiry badhegi na to customer ka call back automatically aayega inquiry call flow hai waise bhi mai aapko batau aapke maximum jo call aayi hai na kisi bhi odd month me wo char se jyada nahi aayi hai right but ye practice agar hum karenge to shayad aapka jo call flow hai right wo bhi hoga but ye consistency rehna chahiye wo jo flow hai na wo aisa na ho ki kisi din 10 ho raha hai aur kisi din do ho raha hai wo aisa ho sakta hai kisi din teen hua kisi din saat hua kisi din char hua kisi din che hua is tarah se aap dekhiye call ka flow to ye hai ki char teen do char teen do right is mahine agar panch call flow aage to at least aap mere pe bhi trust kar paoge theek hai try karke dekhiye aur buylead se fir hum aapko ek bar connect karte hai theek hai na jaise ki mujhe batayega theek hai done thank you okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with lead quality and quantity.

- Call flow has decreased after renewal.

- Not receiving inquiries related to Tally.

- Wants to know why lead consumption is low.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a link to find buyleads.

- Explained algorithm of buylead consumption.

- Suggested using incognito mode to search for buyleads.

- Advised to maintain consistent buylead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps.

- Executive will share the feedback form with customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality, tally, renewal
